nodes.text: The Jedi Sourcebook was a canceled West End Games roleplaying game sourcebook that would have focused on the Jedi. The book was announced in WEG's 1994 catalog. Despite the book's concept being approved by Lucasfilm, WEG decided to shelve the book in light of uncertainties surrounding the depiction of the Jedi in the Prequel trilogy, which was in development at that time. The company received thousands of letters and phone calls asking about the book, and finally printed one of them with an answer in the "ISB Intercepts" column in May 1997's Star Wars Adventure Journal 13.
